title: SoCozy, Curl Spray LeaveIn Conditioner For Kids Hair Detangles and Restores Curls No Parabens Sulfates Synthetic Colors or Dyes, Jojoba Oil,Olive Oil & Vitamin B5, Sweet-Pea, 8 Fl Oz
description: My multi-purpose conditioner repairs curls, infusing them with much needed moisture while preventing frizz. Easily detangles and restores curls leaving them shiny, soft and smooth.
